== Irimbiliyam (CT) (627538) ==

Irimbiliyam (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 24.06 sq. km. and harbouring 5904 households with total population of 30635 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 362 km. Male population is 14557 and female population is 16078. Scheduled Caste population is 3493 and Scheduled Tribes population is 214. Census Location Code of the town is 627538<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 32 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Kuttippuram at a distance of 11 km.
